com.launchdarkly.client

Class LDConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.launchdarkly.client.LDConfig

  • public final class LDConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exposes advanced configuration options for the LDClient.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LDConfig(java.lang.String apiKey)
      Create a configuration using the default base URL and the specified API key
      LDConfig(java.lang.String apiKey, java.net.URI baseURI, int capacity)
      Create a configuration using the specified base URL and API key

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LDConfig

        public LDConfig(java.lang.String apiKey)
        Create a configuration using the default base URL and the specified API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the API key

      • LDConfig

        public LDConfig(java.lang.String apiKey,
        java.net.URI baseURI,
        int capacity)
        Create a configuration using the specified base URL and API key
        Parameters:
        apiKey - the API key
        baseURI - the base URL for the LaunchDarkly API. Any path specified in the URI will be ignored.
        capacity - the maximum number of events that will be buffered before discarding. Events are batched and sent every 30 seconds, so this should be larger than the number of events the app might create in that time.
